segments.text: I'm looking at this kitchen scene, and it's quite a sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, absolutely gushing over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's making a big puddle on the floor, getting everything soaked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink, though, seems completely oblivious to it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so focused on drying that plate, her attention entirely on it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is right in the water, yet she doesn't even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so unaware of such a mess happening right at their feet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost comical in its absurdity, really.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the steady drip-drip, even though it's a drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll notice before the whole kitchen is flooded.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the calm garden outside is just stark.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This water damage is going to be significant if she doesn't act soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
